caption: Nancy Graves (1939–1995; born Pittsfield, MA; died New York, NY; active New Haven, CT; Paris, France; and New York, NY), Printed by Rodney Konopaki, assisted by Paul Sanders (Canadian, active 1976–1987), Published by Tyler Graphics Ltd. (founded 1974), Toch, 1977. Color etching, aquatint, drypoint, engraving, pochoir, and hand-applied pastel on Arches Cover white wove paper; 50.6 x 60.3 cm (plate), 80.4 x 90.2 cm (sheet). Gift of James Kraft, Class of 1957 (x1993-229)
